# setClientRequestHandler(_:handler:)

**Instance Method**

Sets a handler to react to as a server to inbound WebSocket client handshakes.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency func setClientRequestHandler(_ queue: DispatchQueue, handler: @escaping ([String], [(name: String, value: String)]) -> NWProtocolWebSocket.Response)
```

## Handling Server Handshakes

- **NWProtocolWebSocket.Response**: A WebSocket handshake reponse sent from a server to a client.

items.description: A WebSocket handshake reponse sent from a server to a client.
